title: [1.3.2][SSP/SMP]更多树木&农作物MOD！
author: mjmj1996
txt_content:
本帖最后由 路邊電燈泡 于 2012-10-7 12:22 编辑 

新树种：
相思，香蕉，苹果，天使橡木，榉木布什，黑莓，蓝莓灌木丛，Bukkit树，雪松，樱花（粉红/白色），可可树，水晶树（2），柏树，落叶布什，铁木沙漠，沙漠柳，桉属，常绿灌木，图，银杏，越橘灌木，蓝花楹，约书亚，柠檬，橙，棕，桃花，白杨，覆盆子灌木，红枫，红杉，沼泽柳，宽顶桉树，核桃，黄枫。
生物群落：水晶森林，新的热带森林，新热带森林山，红木森林，红木森林雪山，红木，红木森林，森林雪丘。



好吧，以上为各种树木和生态列表。。。。十分强大。。。MOD介绍：
更多树木包括：
——36种新树，7种新的生态,每种树都是一个生态的一部分
——很多树都会生长水果、果子，并且有独立的树苗，可以用骨粉催熟
——树木和生态都可以在Tree+.cfg中调整
——使用铁斧头或更好的斧子可以获得类似砍树MOD的效果
——在创造模式中可以直接调出所有的方块与树苗
——10种新的花，可以用骨粉催熟
——42种新的叶子，21种新的原木，35种树苗与簇
——11种新木板，使用新的原木制作，或者使用原木+有色染料
——8种水果方块，撸掉它会掉水果
——12种宝石方块，包括一种宝石“火炬”
——11种新的彩色栅栏，11种新的彩色阶梯，11种新的彩色半转
——10种水果，5种面包，2种色拉，3种饮料，4种果子，7种染料
——包括锯子在内的11种工具
——其他一些杂项
——各种方块ID可以在LCTrees.cfg中调整。使用服务端时确保ID和客户端吻合。

更多农作物：
——增加18种农作物
——增加了2种有用的方块：竹板与干主板
——农作物有4个形态，而非8个。现在它们完全成熟的时间应该和小麦相等
——耕田必须临近水去保持自身；新的农作物不会停止耕地变回泥土
——增加11种新的种子，可以再高草丛中找到
——增加16种食物，有小且短暂的增益
——增加4种农作物物品：棉花球，麻纤维 - >绳纱， - >绳线束
——增加绳子
——增加13种可合成的碗装食物，每种食物都有不同的益处
——各种方块ID可以在LCCrops.cfg中调整。使用服务端时确保ID和客户端吻合。

更新日志：1.4.5
LCTrees:
-水晶树叶现在会正常凋零了（表示上个版本不是修复过了么？）
-修复一个名字上的错误

LCCrops:
-修正骨粉在玉米上的效果
-修正农作物生长时的材质

1.4.4
LCTrees:
-水晶树叶现在会正常凋零了 
-修复新的燃料：树苗和木板。

LCCrops:
-修复新的燃料：竹板
-修复右击葡萄，西红柿，菠萝，或白菜时会引起崩溃

1.4.3
LCTrees:
-树叶现在会正常凋零了
-果子面包合成配方修正





合成表：





预览图：

——表示这些我就不翻译了。。直接搬运。。。
英文树种列表：
Acacia, Angel Oak, Apple, Banana, Beech, Blackberry bush, Blueberry bush, Bukkit Tree, Cedar, Cherry tree(pink/white), Cocoa tree , Crystal Trees (2), Cypress, Deciduous Bush, Desert Ironwood, Desert Willow,Eucalyptus, Evergreen Bush, Fig, Ginkgo, Huckleberry bush, Jacaranda, Joshua, Lemon, Orange, Palm,Peach,Poplar, Raspberry bush, Red Maple, Sequoia, Swamp Willow, Wide-Top Eucalyptus, Walnut, Yellow Maple.
Biomes: Crystal Forest, Neo-Tropical Forest, Neo-Tropical Forest Hills, Redwood Forest, Redwood Forest Hills, Redwood Forest Snow, Redwood Forest Snow Hills.


Angel Oak (Medium size shown)
Partial to Forest biomes.
Its branches reach wide and high.




Fig (Medium size shown)
Partial to Planes biomes.
Grows wide and low.







Jacaranda (left):
Partial to Forest biomes.
Boasts its trademark lavender color.

Yellow Maple (right):
Partial to Taiga biomes.
It is in the likeness of a yellow oak.


Cherry Tree (left):
Partial to Forest biomes.
Has the trademark pink leaves.

Red Maple (right):
Partial to Taiga biomes.
A red version of the average oak.





Cherry Tree (white)(left):
Sometimes cherry trees will grow with white leaves.

Euclyptus (right):
Partial to Forest biomes.
Grows tall and bushy.



Apple (left):
Produces apples.
Partial to Forest biomes.
Grows a thin layer of leaves, but can grow with multiple trunks.
Left-Click a red apple leaf to harvest.

Sequoia (right):
Partial to Taiga and Redwood biomes.
Grows tall and bushy with a thick trunk.




Cypress (left):
Partial to Planes biomes.
Can grow tall and thick with leaves.

Desert Ironwood (right):
Partial to Desert biomes.
It's saplings must still be planted on dirt
Grows at an angle and with fairly deep roots.


Acacia (small version shown):
Partial to Planes biomes.
All leaves are produced at the same height.



Joshua:
Partial to Desert biomes.
Has very small "pockets" of leaves.


Swamp Willow:
Partial to Swamp biomes.
Grows wide and low.
Has drooping leaves.’




Deciduous Bush (Left):
-Partial to forest biomes
-Has a roundish growth

Evergreen Bush (right):
-Partial to taiga and redwood biomes
-Grows low and wide




Palm trees:
-Grow near or on beaches
-Can produce coconuts




Desert Willow:
-Partial to desert biomes
-Has drooping leaves


Cedar (left):
-Partial to taiga and redwood biomes
-Has a tall cone shape

Poplar (right):
-Partial to plains biomes
-Grows similar to cypress trees, but taller


Ginkgo:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Grows large and produces nuts


Beech Tree:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Grows large


Orange Tree:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces Oranges


Peach Tree:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces peaches


Lemon Tree:
-Produces Lemons
-Partial to forest biomes



Bukkit tree:
-Added upon request from bukkit users
-Partial to forest biomes
-Grows tall, with a wide and flat canopy



Banana tree:
-Grows on or near beaches
-Produces bananas




Wide-Top Eucalyptus:
-Partial to Forest biomes
-Grows taller and wider than a normal eucalyptus



Walnut tree:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces nuts


Cocoa Tree:
Partial to tropical forests.
Grows cocoa pods.
Cocoa pods craft into 2 beans.



Raspberry bush (left):
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces berries

Blueberry bush (right):
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces berries



Huckleberry bush:
-Partial to hill biomes
-Produces berries





Blackberry bush:
-Partial to forest biomes
-Produces berries



The added logs (left) and planks (right)


Redwood Forest
-Contains Sequoias, Cedars, and Evergreen bushes


Neo-Tropical Forest
-Contains nearly all the new trees of this mod and normal oaks
-Any tree that grows in this biome will still grow here even if disabled


Redwood Snow Hills
-Redwoods Amidst Snow-caped, rigid hills


Snowy Redwood Forest


Redwood Hills



Neo-Tropical Forest Hills


The Crystal Forest
-Blue grass
-Light and Dark blue crystal trees.
-Light and Dark blue crystal stones.
-Focus-crystals spawn underground.
-All crystal blocks glow (as shown)

需求Forge，扔到mods文件夹底下即可



下载地址：
更多树木：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=65136&uk=3641047218
更多农作物：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=65135&uk=3641047218

呼~总算搬完了~~~收工~~~
